name: Monster defense (TermiSenpai)
description:
Simple and chill tower defense, relax in a procedural map and sky!

6 base enemies and 4 type of bosses vs 6 types of turrets!

Shoot, poison or Slow your enemies, this game doesnt have end! survive and die!

Buy, sell and upgrade your turrets to lvl 3!

Controls:
· ASDW => move camera
· Keep right click => Active free fly
· Left click on turret => show info / upgrade / sell
